com.here.mobility.sdk.sensorawareness.ppoi

Class PpoiClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.net.GrpcClient
      • com.here.mobility.sdk.sensorawareness.ppoi.PpoiClient

  • public class PpoiClient
extends GrpcClient
    The client class for accessing PPOI (Personal Points Of Interest) related services.

    • Method Detail

      • requestPpois

        public ResponseFuture<java.util.List<Ppoi>> requestPpois()
        Retrieves the currently discovered PPOIs. The PPOI discovery process is controlled via PpoiFeature. NOTE: It must be activated for a minimum period of time (e.g. at least 24 hours) before any PPOIs are known.
